belongs_to_collection.name: Pussy Is The Best Medicine Collection

overview: When Markus Dupree checks himself in with a strange pain in his lower regions, Angela sees an opportunity to show her students how to properly assess and treat a patient...and have a little fun in the process!  Charles Dera has a case of overactive testes and needs his balls drained. Stat! Lucky for him, doctor Abella Danger is in house and ready to do whatever it takes to cure her patient.
title: Pussy Is The Best Medicine 8
